Entries.reject_864: What's this? It looks like one of Kent's buddies from the war. I'm... not sure who you should give it to, now.
Entries.Mon2: $d kent#Yesterday I visited Yoba's Altar to pray in memory of my husband.|Yesterday I visited Yoba's Altar to ask for my husband's safe return.#$e#I'm trying to stay positive, but it's hard sometimes.$s
Entries.winter_Wed4_2: Kent... he never fully recovered. There was more I could've done, I know it...$s
Entries.winter_Thu8: We kind of rushed into our marriage, with Kent being a soldier and all... I hardly got a taste of youth and freedom, and now it's too late to ever go back.$s#$e#I can't believe I'm saying this to you...$s

Entries.spring_11.003: Vincent was very brave at the clinic today. I'm proud of him.
Entries.spring_11.000: Vincent hates going to the clinic more than anything, but he'll just have to deal with it.

Entries.spring_11.002: Nurse Maru? I'm worried about Vincent's height. Isn't he a little short for his age?
Magnus? I'm worried about Vincent's height. Isn't he a little short for his age?

Entries.spring_11.003: Vincent's a lot better with going to the clinic, nowadays. I guess he's matured a bit.
Entries.spring_11.001: ...Oh wow, you didn't even react when he put the needle in your arm.
Entries.spring_11.002: So, Vincent's doing alright? Good, good...
Entries.spring_11.000: Taking Vincent to the clinic is more of an inconvenience than an ordeal, now.#$b#I guess having a teenage son isn't all that bad.$h

Changes.LogName: Jodi no longer accompanies Vincent on his hospital visit
